Class MusicCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • MusicCollection

  • public class MusicCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold details of audio files.

        public void startPlaying(int index)
        Start playing a file in the collection. Use stopPlaying() to stop it playing.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the file to be played.

      • validIndex

        private boolean validIndex(java.util.ArrayList list,
                           int index)
        Determine whether the given index is valid for the collection. Print an error message if it is not.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to be checked.
        list - The list to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the index is valid, false otherwise.
